form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
labeling
in
labeled
.

sense.def:
A label
je kos papirja ali plastike, pritrjen na neki predmet, na njem pa so podatki o tem predmetu.

seg.quote: The bottles got wet and all the labels came off.

sense.def:
To label something
pomeni na nekaj pritrditi nalepko.

A label
je tudi beseda ali stavek, s katerim ljudje nekoga opišejo;

seg.quote: He was not willing to accept the label of anarchist.

sense.def:
To label someone as something
pomeni nekoga opisati ali o nekom misliti na določen način;

seg.quote: Once you are labelled as a secretary you will never become anything else.
